thread.title: Who charges for wifi these days?!
thread.title_full: Who charges for wifi these days?! - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Robin K
title: Who charges for wifi these days?!
text: Nice location, quite an old hotel but the price reflects the standard of the rooms. Really annoyed about the crazy wifi charges $15/day is too much when you're here for a week. There is an app offering free wifi but it wouldn't work for me and when I asked reception they said there was no free wifi option, and that there was no one who knew about it.
